params.name: username
params.desc: The Keystore user that controls the account specified in `to`

params.name: password
params.desc: The password of the Keystore user

params.name: to
params.desc: The address of the account the asset is sent to.

params.name: sourceChain
params.desc: The chainID where the funds are coming from. Ex: "X"

name: import
desc: Send ANT (Avalanche Native Token) assets including AVAX from an account on the X-Chain to an address on the C-Chain. This transaction must be signed with the key of the account that the asset is sent from and which pays the transaction fee. by calling issueTx.
